reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its flattering ruching along the sides and how it accentuates curves beautifully. The dress is comfortable, well-made, and features a stretchy slip layer with a solid stretchy material. They appreciate its color variety, with one customer noting its vibrant pattern, and find it extremely flattering to the body. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one mentioning it falls right above the ankles. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fit, Gorgeous Print, and Excellent Quality!
items.body: The PRETTYGARDEN Long Maxi Bodycon Floral Dress is absolutely stunning! The fit is perfect, hugging in all the right places while still being comfortable and flattering. The fabric feels soft, breathable, and high quality, with just the right amount of stretch. The floral design is gorgeous and vibrant, exactly as pictured, and the length is perfect for both casual days and dressier occasions. I love how versatile it is â€” you can dress it up with heels or keep it casual with sandals, and it still looks effortlessly chic. It arrived well-packaged and wrinkle-free, and the stitching and material quality are excellent. I received so many compliments the first time I wore it! If youâ€™re looking for a comfortable, elegant, and beautifully made dress, this one is a total winner. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jennifer Sauer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute!
items.body: Love this dress! It is very comfortable and flattering. I plan to wear it to a wedding this summer. Iâ€™m 5â€™4 and about 125lb I got a small and it fits well. Itâ€™s very stretchy and goes down to my shins. I also love the color. Itâ€™s a mesh material with a good quality lining. Itâ€™s not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering material and fit
items.body: Love the style and fit, just needed something else for an event. I also got this dress in white for my rehearsal dinner. The fit is so good! It is stretchy and comfortable. The mesh overlay is very flattering. It hugs in all the right spots. I am 5â€™7â€ 150lbs and got a medium, which fit perfect. I love the small leg slit. Read more
items.author: Ripptide808

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful and perfect for summer events. The strapless design stays in place, the material is soft, and the floral mesh detail looks very flattering. It fits true to size and feels comfortable for weddings, vacations, or any special occasion. A great piece for the price. Read more
items.author: Desiree

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Curve hugging midi dress
items.body: Form fitting, curve hugging, and pretty dress. The material is perfect for warmer weather but thick enough to not be see through. The length was perfect, hitting right at the shins. I wore this for a black tie gala and got lots of compliments. Love that it comes in a variety of colors, so you could order multiples for different themes or occasions Read more
items.author: Stephen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STUNNIN'
items.body: SO gorgeous. Fit me perfectly at 5'2 125lbs, curvy with big butt lil chest. The quality is pretty solid with a double layered fabric that definitely feels thick enough. My only complaint is that it comes with straps to put on and the lil areas where they attach on are visible when the straps are off. But otherwise stunning and great for the price. Read more
items.author: Dani

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dresses
items.body: This dress is the one! It's comfortable, elegant, and made from beautiful material that can be dressed up or down. Whether you wear it with heels for a night out or with sandals for a casual brunch, it seamlessly fits any occasion. The detailed design adds an element of sophistication, making it a standout item in any closet. Additionally, the fabric feels luxurious on the skin, ensuring you look and feel your best throughout the day. With its adaptable style, this dress is bound to become a beloved staple for many seasons ahead. I bought the yellow version and am excited to add the black to my wardrobe.ðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Jocy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress - hugs the body (recommend shape wear underneath)
items.body: Gorgeous color. Comfortable fabric. Flattering as long as you suck in the tummy I recommend wearing shape wear underneath lol. See photos for the difference. Read more
items.author: Chloe johnson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy Red Big Floral, Print Light Orange, Print Lake Blue, Floral Purple, Solid Green, Green Big Floral, Solid Rose Red, Floral Rose Red, Solid Wine Red, Orange Red Big Floral, White, Solid Light Blue, Floral Yellow, Print Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
